course_description: Required for East Asian Studies majors. An advanced seminar probing themes in the study of East Asia. Topics may include issues in comparative colonialism, the volatility of shared meanings of identity as well as reconstructions of national subjects in literature, popular culture, and the arts.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2028, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: C. Crowley, Status: Closed
